hero.title: Who is TEYSİR?
hero.desc: TEYSİR is an organizing company that connects, in a safe and professional way, international humanitarian associations with donors who wish to help people in need in Africa. We plan, manage, and monitor end-to-end processes to ensure proper field implementation of humanitarian programs such as Qurban (sacrifices), water well construction, food distribution, and other aid projects. Our goal is to ensure every donation reaches the right person, at the right time, under the best possible conditions.
